title: Cookie

verbs: To consume something solid or semi-solid (usually food) by putting it into the mouth and eventually swallowing it.
To consume (something solid or semi-solid, usually food) by putting it into the mouth and swallowing it.
Be very hot, due to hot weather or exposure to the sun
To eat a snack or light meal.
To eat small things in between meals.
nouns: Food made from ground roasted cocoa beans.
Chocolate is a typically sweet, usually brown, food preparation of Theobroma cacao seeds, roasted and ground, often flavored, as with vanilla.
Chocolate describes a number of raw and processed foods that originate from the tropical cacao tree.
Food produced from the seed of the tropical Theobroma cacao tree
Historically also known as cocoa
A food made from ground roasted cocoa beans
A food made from roasted ground cacao beans
A sweet confection served as the last course of a meal
A dish served as the last course of a meal
A usage seen in the United Kingdom and some other Commonwealth countries.
Dessert is a typically sweet course that concludes an evening meal.
A sweet confection served as the last course of a meal.
Sweet confection served as the last course of a meal.
Sweet course that concludes a meal
Oreo is a sandwich cookie consisting of two chocolate wafers with a sweet cream filling in between.
A cookie made up of two black, chocolate wafers joined by a layer of white, sugary filling.
Chocolate cookie with white cream filling
Sandwich cookie made by Kraft
Cookie made up of two dark brown, chocolate wafers joined by a layer of white, sugary filling.
A light informal meal
A light meal.
A small meal or snack.
Discussion, light meal.
A small meal.
The term "collation" originates in the Roman Catholic Church, where it refers to the two small meals allowed on days of fasting, with or without abstinence.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description:
A golden-brown chocolate chip cookie or biscuit. Used to represent cookies or biscuits in general.

Samsung's original design featured a pair of pale square biscuits that also look like saltine crackers. Since then they have changed their design to be a single chocolate chip cookie.
apple_vendor_description: The cookie emoji on Apple devices presents a delightfully textured, golden-brown baked treat, complete with subtle chocolate chips rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. Its soft, rounded edges and the gentle play of light across its surface evoke a sense of warmth and comfort, perfect for sharing in messages about delicious food or sweet indulgences. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is a small, delightful visual invitation to enjoy a moment of simple pleasure.
